meanings.definition: Very small units of length, used in scientific measurements.
meanings.sent1: Scientists use nanos to measure tiny things.
meanings.sent2: The nanos on the ruler help measure small objects.
meanings.sent3: I dropped my nanos and now I can't find them!
meanings.sent4: The nanos of dust danced in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The nanos of the insect were magnified under the microscope.

meanings.sent1: The scientist used nanos to show a very small fraction.
meanings.sent2: In science, nanos represent a tiny fraction of a whole.
meanings.sent3: I added a nanos of sugar to my tea, just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The nanos of light illuminated the room.
meanings.sent5: The nanos of time seemed to stretch on forever.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a person's grandparent.
meanings.sent1: My nanos always tells the best stories.
meanings.sent2: I love visiting my nanos on weekends.
meanings.sent3: My nanos can bake the most delicious cookies!
meanings.sent4: The wisdom of my nanos is like a treasure chest.
meanings.sent5: My nanos' garden is a beautiful oasis of flowers.
